name: Halloween Spiders
description:
Save the Trick-or-Treaters by squishing the Halloween Spiders.

Use your finger to squish the Halloween Spiders while avoiding the Trick-or-Treaters. If you squish the number of spiders needed to complete the level, you win that level and move on to the next level. Complete all five levels and win the game!

Watch out for Trick-or-Treaters, they can be squished too! If you squish a Trick-or-Treater or if a Trick-or-Treater gets eaten, you loose 20% of your strength. If any spiders walk off of the screen you loose 2% of your strength and 1 Spider gets added to the total amount of Spiders you have to squish to complete that level. If your strenght level falls to 0%, you loose the game and the Halloween Spiders eat the Trick-or-Treaters!

How many Halloween Spiders can you squish? You have to play to find out. Download Halloween Spiders Today!

Good Luck & Happy Halloween!
